headline: Western Digital (WDC): Examining Valuation After Blowout Earnings and Renewed Analyst Optimism
summary: If you follow Western Digital (WDC), you probably noticed the buzz after its latest results. The company grabbed the spotlight by blowing past Wall Street’s earnings expectations and offering guidance that points to even more growth ahead. The enthusiasm did not stop there; analysts piled on with upbeat notes, including a high-profile ‘Top Pick’ endorsement from Morgan Stanley, and investors responded by sending the shares higher in a hurry. This energy comes on top of a remarkable stretch...
